original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key player, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency. The primary focus will be on developing new processes and implementing innovative technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive rapid solution development.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using a variety of techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate the captured business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, report generation, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) processes.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and improvements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically and creatively
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL programming languages
- Experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive solution development

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning and AI-driven solutions in a professional setting

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and applying Agile methodologies to software development projects
- Hands-on experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a strong understanding of the associated business processes and technical challenges

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using database querying tools (e.g., SQL, SSMS, Tableau) for data analysis and reporting
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaboration platforms (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Experience in working with various configuration and testing tools (e.g., Jenkins, Selenium, Postman)

This role offers a unique opportunity to bridge the gap between business strategy and technical implementation, leveraging your exceptional analytical skills and deep understanding of complex business processes. As a key member of the team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of the business and operate at peak efficiency, with a particular focus on the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage extensively with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate the captured business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, which includes developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Leverage your analytical prowess to delve into existing data, identify trends, uncover inefficiencies, and pinpoint areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to generate valuable insights.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Ensure the quality and reliability of the configured solutions by rigorously testing them to verify that they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) processes.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support the ongoing maintenance and continuous improvement of the systems.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate the smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of the configured solutions.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively to devise innovative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, coupled with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL programming languages, with a strong understanding of their application in system configuration and data analysis
- Demonstrated experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive solution development

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their implementation in software development projects
- In-depth knowledge of the vehicle configuration domain, including an understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning and AI-driven solutions in a professional setting

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and applying Agile methodologies to software development projects
- Hands-on experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical challenges

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using a variety of database querying tools (e.g., SQL, SSMS, Tableau) for data analysis and reporting
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaboration platforms (e.g., Jira, Confluence) to support effective team-based development
- Experience in working with configuration and testing tools (e.g., Jenkins, Selenium, Postman) to ensure the quality and reliability of the configured solutions

As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into robust technical configurations, utilizing the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver transformative outcomes.
